mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM (SELECT * FROM ( select * from v_log_off_info t where 1=1
and t.entname like '${entset}%' or t.regno = '${entset}' or t.unifsocicrediden = '${entset}'
and t.lastdate >= to_date('${stime}'||'00:00:00', 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and t.lastdate <= to_date('${etime}'||'23:59:59', 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.estdate >= to_date('${stime}'||'00:00:00', 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and t.estdate <= to_date('${etime}'||'23:59:59', 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.apprdate >= to_date('${stime}'||'00:00:00', 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and t.apprdate <= to_date('${etime}'||'23:59:59', 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') ) ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= ${pageEnd} ) WHERE RN > ${pageBegin}

select /*+parallel(t,16)*/ count(1) from v_log_off_info t where 1=1
and t.entname like '${entset}%' or t.regno = '${entset}' or t.unifsocicrediden = '${entset}'
and t.lastdate >= to_date('${stime}'||'00:00:00', 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and t.lastdate <= to_date('${etime}'||'23:59:59', 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.estdate >= to_date('${stime}'||'00:00:00', 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and t.estdate <= to_date('${etime}'||'23:59:59', 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.apprdate >= to_date('${stime}'||'00:00:00', 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and t.apprdate <= to_date('${etime}'||'23:59:59', 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
